answer:
A successful movie is one in which the gross revenue is high., and has high rating, and revenue exceeds the production budget, 
1) The highest grossing movies seem to have been released in summer (May-July) or December. 
2) Fiction-based movies describe the top three highest grossing movies in this dataset (Science Fiction, Historical Fiction, and Kids/Fantasy.SuperHero Fiction). 
3) The highest rated movies seem to be coming from drama and thriller/suspense, 
Also  between 102-194 minutes long ; not too short or too long.
